name: Electron
description: Fundamental particle, carries negative electromagnetic charge, exhibits wave-particle duality, and occupies quantized energy levels in an atom's electron cloud.

name: Quark Up
description: Fundamental particle, carries positive two-thirds elementary charge, and experiences strong nuclear force.

name: Quark Down
description: Fundamental particle, carries negative one-third elementary charge, subject to strong nuclear force in quantum physics.

name: Proton
description: Subatomic particle, found in atomic nuclei, carries positive charge, composed of quarks, and contributes to the atom's overall positive charge.

name: Neutron
description: Subatomic particle, located in atomic nuclei, carries no charge, composed of quarks, and contributes to atomic mass without adding electric charge.

name: Hydrogen
description: Elemental atom of atomic number 1. The simplest and most abundant in the universe, forming the basis of stars.

name: Deuterium
description: Elemental atom of atomic number 1. Hydrogen with an extra neutron.

name: Unstable Helium
description: Elemental atom of atomic number 2. Lighter than usual, and decays very quickly. It lacks something...

name: Helium
description: Elemental atom of atomic number 2. Second lightest element, commonly used in balloons and cryogenics.

name: Lithium
description: Elemental atom of atomic number 3. An alkali metal essential in batteries and used in various industrial applications.

name: Beryllium
description: Elemental atom of atomic number 4. A lightweight metal, strong, with applications in aerospace and nuclear industries.

name: Boron
description: Elemental atom of atomic number 5. A metalloid with diverse applications, including electronics and borosilicate glass.

name: Carbon
description: Elemental atom of atomic number 6. Fundamental to life's organic compounds, forms diverse molecular structures.

name: Nitrogen
description: Elemental atom of atomic number 7. Essential for life, abundant in Earth's atmosphere, and crucial for the nitrogen cycle.

name: Oxygen
description: Elemental atom of atomic number 8. Vital for respiration, combustion, and a key element in various compounds.

name: Helium Gas
description: It is a noble gas with a stable configuration and is commonly used in various application.
